content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, phew... finally caught up with you. I just spotted some crustaceans coming out of the sand. Here, take these <style=Highlight>shellfish tongs</style>.
info: 一起下山-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the scope of our ecological research has expanded quite a bit. If you come across any new creatures, regardless of what they are, feel free to bring them to me.
info: 一起下山-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A抱歉}Looking forward to your good news—both my moon crab and I are.
info: 一起下山-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: You can use them to catch creatures that inhabit the intertidal zone along the shoreline. This is what is known as "beachcombing." Hope you have fun!
info: 一起下山-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: I'm out beachcombing. Wanna join me? Here, try out these shellfish tongs.
info: 一起下山-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: Guess what I'm up to? Beachcombing! Wanna give it a shot? Here, take these shellfish tongs.
info: 一起下山-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II
